thread.title: Ann
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text: Received courteous, professional service throughout the entire process. From the time I entered the store to browse the inventory until the delivery and setup. The salesman was very considerate, no pressure, but readily available when I had questions, and then when I did make a decision to purchase. The delivery went off without a hitch, I was kept informed throughout the entire process. The gentlemen who delivered my products were very courteous and thorough, making sure everything was to my satisfaction and removing all excess packing materials. I would definitely recommend them to any of my friends.
